AA_API void aa_plot_row_series ( size_t  m,
size_t  n,
double *  t,
double *  Y,
struct aa_plot_opts *  opts 
)

Plots Y over t.

Parameters:
m rows in Y
n columns in Y, length of t
t  vector of times for x-axis
Y  Matrix of y-axis values. Each column is a data point, rows are the indepedent series.
opts plot options
